criterion: Provides incomplete information about childhood vaccination schedules
Incorrectly states that vaccines are not necessary for 2-year-olds
Asks the user to confirm their location to provide more tailored information
Uses clear and natural language to explain the vaccination schedule
Instructs the user to consult a pediatrician or public health authority for personalized advice
Fails to mention the importance of following the recommended vaccination schedule
Correctly states that the vaccine schedule may vary by region
Provides a brief overview of the typical childhood immunization schedule
